title: Hour 2 : Flights and Frights
description:
On this episode Joe Fortenbaugh gives his take on who YOU should bet on this weekend. Stephen A Smith, Damien Woody and Jay Williams discuss some very controversial topics. Do you think Tom Brady and Aaron Rodgers should retire after this season? Do you think the Lakers should trade their BIG 3? Do you think the Broncos have any chance of redeeming themselves this season? Tune in to hear what they think.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
